meaningMnemonic: You use a <radical>bookshelf</radical> as a <kanji>book counter</kanji>. Duh. What, are you gonna count them one by one? Okay, well maybe, but you should count them while they're nice and organized on the shelves. Otherwise counting is going to be a huge pain.
readingMnemonic: You use this <kanji>book counter</kanji> method to count all the books <reading>Satsu</reading>ki (さつ) has in her house. Remember her? She's got, like, a ton of books, but she's just a little girl so she needs some help. That's where your book counter know-how comes in handy.
